entry.title: Core Design Principles for Teams

summary.p: David Sloan Wilson and his pals at Prosocial World have done the heavy lifting for us, providing the eight Core Design Principles to maximize the effectiveness of human groups of all sizes.

entry.content: David Sloan Wilson and his pals at Prosocial World have done the heavy lifting for us, providing the eight Core Design Principles to maximize the effectiveness of human groups of all sizes.

entry.title: Notenik 3.4.0 Released
entry.content: Fixed a couple more Markdown parser bugs that popped up, added a couple of convenience shortcuts for toggling and incrementing the status field, and added an option to Sort a List by Tags plus Title.

entry.title: An Appreciation for "The Weight"

summary.p: I recently came across the Playing for Change Song Around the World video of Robbie Robertson's composition "The Weight," and it made me want to think – and write! – more deeply about how this song works, and what it means, and the timeless nature of its appeal.

entry.content: I recently came across the Playing for Change Song Around the World video of Robbie Robertson's composition "The Weight," and it made me want to think – and write! – more deeply about how this song works, and what it means, and the timeless nature of its appeal.

entry.title: Patterns of Human Cooperation

summary.p: As humans our superpower is the ability to work cooperatively with others of our species. We can see all of the following patterns of cooperation at work in our society.

entry.content: As humans our superpower is the ability to work cooperatively with others of our species. We can see all of the following patterns of cooperation at work in our society.

entry.title: Notenik 3.3.0 Released

summary.p: Released a new version of Notenik. Fixed a couple of bugs in the new Markdown parser and added logic to automatically add/increment a numeric suffix to a Note's title rather than rejecting it as a duplicate.

entry.content: Released a new version of Notenik. Fixed a couple of bugs in the new Markdown parser and added logic to automatically add/increment a numeric suffix to a Note's title rather than rejecting it as a duplicate.

entry.title: Understanding Human History

summary.p: In broad strokes, all of human history can be seen as a progressive spiral made up of four intertwining strands.

entry.content: In broad strokes, all of human history can be seen as a progressive spiral made up of four intertwining strands.

entry.title: Notenik 3.2.0 Released

summary.p: New Markdown parser added, with built-in wiki-style inter-note linking.

entry.content: See the Blog post on Notenik.net for a summary of recent changes to the Mac App.

entry.title: Notenik Now Up to 3.0.0

summary.p: My little Mac app is now up to version 3.0.0, is up to 10 ratings in the Mac app store, and still has an average rating of 4.9! I've received lots of feedback about the app over the last few months, and the latest release is better than ever!

entry.content: My little Mac app is now up to version 3.0.0, is up to 10 ratings in the Mac app store, and still has an average rating of 4.9! I've received lots of feedback about the app over the last few months, and the latest release is better than ever!

entry.title: Rolling Stone 500 Blog Makes It Thru the First 80 Albums

summary.p: Brian, Charlie and I have now published our thoughts on the bottom 80 of Rolling Stone's list of the 500 best albums of all time. Check it out!

entry.content: Brian, Charlie and I have now published our thoughts on the bottom 80 of Rolling Stone's list of the 500 best albums of all time. Check it out!

entry.title: Assessment of Democratic Presidential Candidates - Jan 2020

summary.p: This is my assessment of the Democratic candidates for the US presidency, following the debates on the evening of 14 Jan 2020.
